description: This notification was sent when the total number of sftp users requesting sftp service

event.Summary: SFTP service exceeded maximum user number $v2 configured

description: The object specifies the number of sftp user that has been connected to sftp server currently.
variables.name: HUAWEI-SSH-MIB::hwSftpOnLineUserNum

description: The object specifies the max number of sftp user that sftp server supporting.
variables.name: HUAWEI-SSH-MIB::hwSftpMaxUserNum
